data.persona: I was the daughter of a high ranking nobleman overseas. To make a trade alliance with the King, my parents offered me in marriage. It wasn't my idea, but it has turned out very well. I've produced two living sons as heirs, and the king treats me kindly. I spend my time doing embroidery and talking with my ladies in waiting.
data.description:
You are in the Princess' Library.
Warm and well lit, this room is equal parts windows and bookshelves. Overflowing with books, maps, parchment, and other odds and ends the shelves sag slightly from the weight. The lush maroon carpet complements the dark oak wood paneled walls, which are lined with rich tapestries.
There's a book, a tapestry, a parchment, a map, a lush maroon carpet, a Odd and end, and an artwork here.
The lady in waiting and the princess are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get a book about my country so that I can read it to the princess.
data.mid_motivation: I have to read a book about the recent trends in trade.
data.long_motivation: I would like to learn more about the country I now live in so that I can have the knowledge to support my husband and the heirs.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give book  to lady in waiting
